title: Weapons
story: A suspenseful action-thriller about a rogue arms dealer who threatens global stability. A young agent must uncover his deadly network before war breaks out. Twists, betrayals, and intense combat drive the narrative.
movieDetails: Directed by John Doe. Stars Chris Evans and Ana de Armas. Runtime: 2h 15m, Genre: Action/Thriller.

title: Mission: Impossible - The Final Reckoning
story: Ethan Hunt faces his most dangerous mission yet as a global conspiracy threatens humanity. Old allies return while new enemies rise. The clock is ticking in this high-octane finale.
movieDetails: Directed by Christopher McQuarrie. Stars Tom Cruise, Rebecca Ferguson, Hayley Atwell. Runtime: 2h 30m, Genre: Action/Spy.

title: F1: The Movie
story: An underdog driver fights for glory on the world’s fastest tracks. With speed, rivalries, and passion, the story captures the spirit of Formula 1. Every race is a battle for survival and victory.
movieDetails: Directed by Joseph Kosinski. Stars Miles Teller and Daniel Brühl. Runtime: 2h 10m, Genre: Sports/Drama.

title: The Conjuring: Last Rites
story: Ed and Lorraine Warren confront blackheir darkesblackpanther haunting yet. A cursed church unleashes malevolent forces that defy faith. Their final case pushes them to the edge of horror.
movieDetails: Directed by Michael Chaves. Stars Patrick Wilson and Vera Farmiga. Runtime: 2h 5m, Genre: Horror/Supernatural.

title: The Naked Gun (2025)
story: Detective Frank Drebin returns with hilarious antics and absurd crime-solving skills. This reboot combines slapstick humor with modern chaos. Expect wild chases, dumb luck, and endless laughter.
movieDetails: Directed by Akiva Schaffer. Stars Liam Neeson and Pamela Anderson. Runtime: 1h 50m, Genre: Comedy/Action.

title: Avengers: Doomsday
story: Earth’s Mightiest Heroes face a cosmic threat that could erase reality itself. Old and new Avengers must unite against impossible odds. A climactic battle tests loyalty, sacrifice, and destiny.
movieDetails: Directed by Destin Daniel Cretton. Stars Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Brie Larson. Runtime: 2h 40m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Avatar 3
story: Jake Sully and Neytiri face new dangers as Pandora is threatened again. Ancient tribes reveal secrets hidden beneath the oceans. An epic continuation of love, war, and survival.
movieDetails: Directed by James Cameron. Stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldana, Kate Winslet. Runtime: 3h 5m, Genre: Sci-Fi/Adventure.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine 2
story: Deadpool and Wolverine return for a chaotic, hilarious, and violent adventure. They break the multiverse with sarcastic banter and brutal battles. Expect nonstop action and fourth-wall comedy.
movieDetails: Directed by Shawn Levy. Stars Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman. Runtime: 2h 20m, Genre: Action/Comedy.

title: Shrek 5
story: Shrek is pulled out of retirement when Far Far Away faces new magical chaos. Alongside Donkey and Fiona, he embarks on a wild, comedic quest. Family, friendship, and ogre-sized laughs await.
movieDetails: Directed by Walt Dohrn. Voices of Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz. Runtime: 1h 45m, Genre: Animation/Comedy.

title: How to Train Your Dragon (Live Action)
story: A live-action retelling of Hiccup and Toothless’ legendary bond. Vikings learn to coexist with dragons in an emotional, epic journey. Heart, spectacle, and adventure bring the classic to life.
movieDetails: Directed by Dean DeBlois. Stars Mason Thames and Nico Parker. Runtime: 2h 10m, Genre: Adventure/Fantasy.

title: Frozen 3
story: Elsa and Anna face a mysterious new power that threatens Arendelle. Secrets of their family’s past unfold as they embark on a magical quest. Love and courage guide their kingdom’s future.
movieDetails: Directed by Jennifer Lee. Voices of Idina Menzel, Kristen Bell, Josh Gad. Runtime: 1h 55m, Genre: Animation/Fantasy.

title: Zootopia 2
story: Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde return to crack a case that shakes Zootopia’s harmony. A new wave of predators threatens unity. Their friendship and courage are tested in a thrilling sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Byron Howard and Rich Moore. Voices of Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman. Runtime: 2h 0m, Genre: Animation/Adventure.

title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
story: Sonic teams up with his friends to face a new powerful foe. Chaos Emeralds and dangerous enemies test their speed and courage. A fun mix of action, comedy, and adventure awaits fans.
movieDetails: Directed by Jeff Fowler. Stars Ben Schwartz, Idris Elba, Jim Carrey. Runtime: 2h 0m, Genre: Action/Adventure.

title: Spider-Man: Beyond the Spider-Verse
story: Miles Morales ventures into uncharted dimensions to save his friends. He faces alternate Spider-heroes and an unstoppable villain. A visually stunning and emotional finale to the trilogy.
movieDetails: Directed by Joaquim Dos Santos. Voices of Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Oscar Isaac. Runtime: 2h 20m, Genre: Animation/Superhero.

title: The Batman Part II
story: Batman faces a darker Gotham as new villains rise. With allies in danger, Bruce must balance vengeance and justice. A gritty continuation of the caped crusader’s saga.
movieDetails: Directed by Matt Reeves. Stars Robert Pattinson, Zoë Kravitz. Runtime: 2h 40m, Genre: Action/Crime.

title: Superman: Legacy
story: Clark Kent struggles to balance his Kryptonian heritage with his human life. A fresh beginning for the Man of Steel unfolds. Hope, courage, and legacy define this new chapter.
movieDetails: Directed by James Gunn. Stars David Corenswet and Rachel Brosnahan. Runtime: 2h 25m, Genre: Superhero/Drama.

title: Inside Out 2
story: Riley enters teenage years with new emotions in her mind. Joy, Sadness, and others must adapt to a bigger emotional world. A heartfelt, funny journey into growing up.
movieDetails: Directed by Kelsey Mann. Voices of Amy Poehler, Phyllis Smith, Maya Hawke. Runtime: 1h 50m, Genre: Animation/Family.

title: Kung Fu Panda 4
story: Po trains a new Dragon Warrior while facing a cunning sorceress. His legacy and kung fu mastery are tested once again. Comedy and action return in this epic sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Mike Mitchell. Voices of Jack Black, Awkwafina, Bryan Cranston. Runtime: 1h 55m, Genre: Animation/Adventure.

title: Moana 2
story: Moana sets sail on a new oceanic journey to distant lands. She discovers hidden cultures and faces powerful natural forces. A vibrant tale of courage and exploration.
movieDetails: Directed by David Derrick Jr. Voices of Auli’i Cravalho, Dwayne Johnson. Runtime: 2h 0m, Genre: Animation/Adventure.

title: Toy Story 5
story: Woody, Buzz, and friends reunite for another heartwarming adventure. A new child discovers the true magic of toys. Friendship, love, and laughter shine once more.
movieDetails: Directed by Josh Cooley. Voices of Tom Hanks, Tim Allen. Runtime: 1h 55m, Genre: Animation/Family.

title: Thor: Ragnarok 2
story: Thor faces a new cosmic threat alongside old allies and unexpected enemies. The fate of Asgard hangs in the balance. Epic battles, humor, and heart define the journey.
movieDetails: Directed by Taika Waititi. Stars Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman. Runtime: 2h 30m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Jurassic World: New Era
story: Dinosaurs roam freely and chaos ensues. New heroes emerge to protect humanity while uncovering hidden secrets about the prehistoric creatures. Adventure and suspense drive the story.
movieDetails: Directed by Colin Trevorrow. Stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard. Runtime: 2h 20m, Genre: Sci-Fi/Adventure.

title: Guardians 4
story: The Guardians face cosmic threats while protecting the galaxy. New allies join the team, and old enemies return. Humor, action, and heart make the adventure unforgettable.
movieDetails: Directed by James Gunn. Stars Chris Pratt, Zoe Saldana. Runtime: 2h 30m, Genre: Superhero/Adventure.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever 2
story: Wakanda faces a new global threat while T’Challa’s legacy inspires heroes. Alliances are tested and secrets revealed. A powerful blend of action, culture, and emotion.
movieDetails: Directed by Ryan Coogler. Stars Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong’o. Runtime: 2h 25m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Doctor Strange 3
story: Doctor Strange faces a new mystical threat that bends reality. With allies across the multiverse, he fights to restore balance. Mind-bending visuals and high stakes define this chapter.
movieDetails: Directed by Sam Raimi. Stars Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen. Runtime: 2h 20m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Ant-Man 3
story: Scott Lang returns to face new micro and macro threats. With allies old and new, he navigates dangerous situations while balancing heroics and humor.
movieDetails: Directed by Peyton Reed. Stars Paul Rudd, Evangeline Lilly. Runtime: 2h 5m, Genre: Superhero/Comedy.

title: Fantastic 4
story: The Fantastic Four face an interdimensional threat that could destroy Earth. Their teamwork and powers are tested as they fight to save humanity.
movieDetails: Directed by Matt Shakman. Stars John Krasinski, Emily Blunt. Runtime: 2h 15m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Minions 3
story: The Minions embark on a global adventure to find a new villain to serve. Comedy, chaos, and colorful antics fill this family-friendly sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Kyle Balda. Voices of Pierre Coffin, Taraji P. Henson. Runtime: 1h 40m, Genre: Animation/Comedy.

title: The Flash 2
story: Barry Allen faces a new threat that could rewrite the timeline. Team Flash must stop the villain while navigating time anomalies. Speed, humor, and drama collide in this superhero tale.
movieDetails: Directed by Andy Muschietti. Stars Ezra Miller, Michael Keaton. Runtime: 2h 10m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Lion King 2
story: Simba faces new challenges in ruling the Pride Lands. A new threat emerges while young lions learn responsibility, courage, and friendship.
movieDetails: Directed by Barry Jenkins. Voices of Donald Glover, Beyoncé. Runtime: 1h 50m, Genre: Animation/Adventure.

title: Aquaman 3
story: Arthur Curry defends Atlantis from new undersea threats. Ancient powers rise to challenge his throne. Epic battles and breathtaking ocean visuals return.
movieDetails: Directed by James Wan. Stars Jason Momoa, Amber Heard. Runtime: 2h 20m, Genre: Superhero/Fantasy.

title: Doctor Strange: Dark Dimension
story: Doctor Strange journeys into the Dark Dimension. Old spells and forbidden magic threaten the multiverse. A mind-bending battle of sorcery unfolds.
movieDetails: Directed by Sam Raimi. Stars Benedict Cumberbatch, Elizabeth Olsen. Runtime: 2h 15m, Genre: Superhero/Fantasy.

title: Venom 3
story: Eddie Brock and Venom face their deadliest symbiote rival yet. Chaos spreads as humanity is caught in the crossfire. Dark humor and brutal action fuel this sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Kelly Marcel. Stars Tom Hardy. Runtime: 2h 10m, Genre: Superhero/Action.

title: Morbius Returns
story: Dr. Michael Morbius battles his inner monster while facing a stronger foe. His struggle between hero and villain deepens. A dark chapter in Sony’s Marvel universe.
movieDetails: Directed by Daniel Espinosa. Stars Jared Leto. Runtime: 2h 0m, Genre: Superhero/Horror.

title: Eternals 2
story: The surviving Eternals regroup after cosmic upheaval. A new celestial threat tests their unity and purpose. Gods, heroes, and humans clash in this epic sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Chloé Zhao. Stars Gemma Chan, Richard Madden. Runtime: 2h 35m, Genre: Superhero/Fantasy.

title: Hercules (Live Action)
story: The legendary demigod Hercules rises to prove his worth. Trials of strength, heart, and destiny shape his path. A modern retelling of a mythic Disney classic.
movieDetails: Directed by Guy Ritchie. Stars Taron Egerton. Runtime: 2h 10m, Genre: Adventure/Fantasy.

title: Frozen Earth
story: An ancient ice age force awakens, freezing the world. A group of explorers fights to restore balance. Survival and sacrifice shape this frozen adventure.
movieDetails: Directed by Peter Ramsey. Stars Daisy Ridley. Runtime: 2h 0m, Genre: Sci-Fi/Adventure.

title: Encanto 2
story: The Madrigal family faces a new magical mystery. Mirabel discovers hidden powers within the family’s legacy. Music and magic return in this heartfelt sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Jared Bush, Byron Howard. Voices of Stephanie Beatriz, John Leguizamo. Runtime: 1h 55m, Genre: Animation/Musical.

title: Wish 2
story: Asha embarks on a new quest when wishing magic spirals out of control. Star guides her through enchanted realms. A colorful adventure about dreams and destiny.
movieDetails: Directed by Chris Buck. Voices of Ariana DeBose, Alan Tudyk. Runtime: 1h 50m, Genre: Animation/Fantasy.

title: Frozen Legacy
story: Elsa and Anna uncover the legacy of Arendelle’s first rulers. A buried secret could alter their kingdom forever. Sisterhood and courage guide their journey.
movieDetails: Directed by Jennifer Lee. Voices of Idina Menzel, Kristen Bell. Runtime: 1h 55m, Genre: Animation/Fantasy.

title: Aladdin 2
story: Aladdin faces a new villain who seeks the lamp’s magic. With Jasmine and Genie, he must protect Agrabah once more. Love and adventure shine in this sequel.
movieDetails: Directed by Guy Ritchie. Stars Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Will Smith. Runtime: 2h 5m, Genre: Fantasy/Adventure.
